# Starknet SHARP Proof Fraction Boundaries

- Source: `sharp-bi.provingservice.io/sharp_bi/aggregations`
- Analysis window: `2024-03-01` to `2026-02-19` (weekly buckets)
- Segmentation basis: Starknet `proof_cost_eth / total_proof_cost_eth`
- Segment count: 16 (kept below requested max ~20)
- `recommendedHackMultiplier` = weighted mean proof fraction in segment
- `onchainBoundaryCheck` indicates whether the same boundary is also visible in `onchain_data_cost_eth` fraction (non-triangulating check only)
